name: Mildew (kindaokev, jordan--vision)
description:
This is a game made for GB jam 10. It's a puzzle-platformer about a small fluff of mildew that runs around collecting little moldy guys. In this game, the player is capable of ground-pounding into potted plants and using their abilities to their advantage, like a dandelion gives you the ability to double jump, etc., etc.. It's heavily unfinished so apologies if you get soft-locked anywhere in the game!

The game is played with the arrow keys using space as the select button to leave pots and z to jump. Ground-pounding can be done by pressing the down arrow.

The art and levels were designed by me while the game was programmed by my buddy Jordan

Update: Fixed a waterfall bug in level 2 that prevented the player from progressing. Also fixed a bug that prevented the player from taking damage in water.
